thread.title: How Olympic Bobsled Turned Into ‘Dancing With the Stars’

author: Brian Costa
title: How Olympic Bobsled Turned Into ‘Dancing With the Stars’
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—The first time Sam McGuffie got into a bobsled, he wanted to puke. He’d been through the rigors of college football, after a high school highlight film made him an internet sensation. He’d even experienced an NFL training camp. The bobsled run in Lake Placid, N.Y., brought a different kind of violence.
“It’s like jumping in a garbage can and rolling down the stairs for a minute straight,” he said.
Three...
